selected_quotes: PLOS Computational Biology: A New Online Computational Biology Curriculum
An updated online comp bio curriculum (update to 2012 version #bioinformatics

citation.abstract: A recent proliferation of Massive Open Online Courses (MOOCs) and other web-based educational resources has greatly increased the potential for effective self-study in many fields. This article introduces a catalog of several hundred free video courses of potential interest to those wishing to expand their knowledge of bioinformatics and computational biology. The courses are organized into eleven subject areas modeled on university departments and are accompanied by commentary and career advice.
citation.title: A New Online Computational Biology Curriculum

reddit.title: A New (Free) Online Computational Biology Curriculum
